BoolProperty.Name: VcpkgEnabled
BoolProperty.Description: Use Vcpkg for includes and libraries.

BoolProperty.Name: VcpkgUseStatic
BoolProperty.Description: Vcpkg can build static libraries (e.g. x64-windows-static). This options changes the default triplet to use these static libraries by appending -static to $(VcpkgTriplet). This will not be shown in the evaluation of the Triplet within the UI.

BoolProperty.Name: VcpkgAutoLink
BoolProperty.Description: Enables automatic linking with libraries build using Vcpkg

StringProperty.Name: VcpkgUserTriplet
StringProperty.Description: Specifies the triplet used by Vcpkg

StringProperty.Name: VcpkgBasePath
StringProperty.Description: Base path where Vcpkg is located. Be careful with changing this one. It is, for example, unable to update this property page from the new location without restarting visual studio.

StringProperty.Name: VcpkgRoot
StringProperty.Description: Defines the direct path to the installed Vcpkg packages. Only change this if you know what you are doing!

EnumProperty.Name: VcpkgConfiguration
EnumProperty.Description: Specifies if release or debug libraries build with vcpkg should be used.
